messages.body: $CPA https://www.financecolombia.com/copa-airlines-reinitiates-flight-operations-in-colombia/

links.title: Copa Airlines Reinitiates Flight Operations In Colombia
links.description: Panama City based Copa Airlines has announced that after seven months of not operating due to travel restrictions imposed by the governments of the region after the COVID-19 crisis, it has re-initiated flights between Colombia and its Tocumen International Airport hub in Panama City.

messages.body:
GOL Linhas expects Q4 capacity growth of 100% and revenue growth of ~130% sequentially  $GOL $CPA $LUV $RYAAY $AZUL 

https://newsfilter.io/a/48befbe8a83b040d57d99d440e3e042e

links.title: GOL Linhas expects Q4 capacity growth of 100% and revenue growth of ~130% sequentially
links.description: GOL Linhas Aéreas Inteligentes' current capacity planning scenario assumes 100% growth in 4Q20 vs. 3Q20.The company operated ~376 daily flights in Ocotber, reaching peaks of 500 daily flights, serving 95% of the market.The company expects to end December with an average of 94 aircraft operating in the network, representing more than 75% of the operating fleet in the same period last year, maintaining a consistent load factor of ~80% in the quarter.

messages.body: $CPA definitely due for some short term pain, but this is on my long list. Good exposure to growing LatAm economy and developing markets.

messages.body: $CPA if the airline can survive the winter rounds of Covid , I think people will get tired of it and finally just go places but... who am I 🤷‍♀️

$CPA i dont know why i keep looking at this ticker its really self-sabotage at its finest lol. I had the opportunity to buy-in at $40 but decided not to ONLY bc a friend told me he "didn't trust Brazil right now bc of COVID." And now i just watch. From afar. With a tear slowly running down my cheek.. trying to be a big boy... 👋😢 #TheOneThatGotAway

messages.body: $CPA Copa Holdings Announces Third Quarter Financial Results Release Schedule https://www.otcdynamics.com/cpa-copa-holdings-announces-third-quarter-financial-results-release-schedule

links.title: $CPA Copa Holdings Announces Third Quarter Financial Results Release Schedule
links.description: Copa Holdings is a leading Latin American provider of passenger and cargo services. The Company, through its operating subsidiaries, provides service to 80 destinations in 33 countries in North, Central and South America and the Caribbean with one of the youngest and most modern fleets in the industry, consisting of 100 aircraft: 6 Boeing 737 MAX9s, 82 Boeing 737NG aircraft and 12 EMBRAER-190s.
